Detailed Description

The project class contains all polls related to the project.

The project class allows you to add, remove and retrive polls related to the project. It also allows you to setup permissions for what site the polls are allowed to be used on. When info is changed in the object the changes is not saved before the Project::save method is called

if Project::isError() returns an Error object after the object was created, the object is in an undefined state

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Project::Project (  &$  db,
$  id = null
) 
 

Constructor

Parameters:
$db a PEAR::DB object
$id the id of the project, must be numeric if the id is set to null a new project will be created if the id could not be found and is not null, Project::isError will return an Error object

Member Function Documentation

Project::addPoll (  $  pollObject  ) 
 

Add a poll object to the project, the add is not permanent before Project::save is called

Parameters:
$pollObject a Poll::Poll object
Returns:
true on sucess, or false on error Project::isError will then return an Error::Error object discribing the error

Project::delete (   ) 
 

Deletes the project and all polls owned by the project when this method has been called you should unset() the object if the call sucesseded

Returns:
false on error, true on sucess. If error Project::isError will return an Error object describing the error

Project::getID (   ) 
 

Returns the projects id

Returns:
int with the projects ID

Project::getPoll (  $  poolID  ) 
 

fetch the poll object with the id if the id is not numeric the Project::isError() will return an Error::Error object explaining the error if the id is not found in the polls in the projects the Project::isError() will return an Error::Error object

Parameters:
$poolID the id of the poll to fetch
Returns:
Pool::Pool object or false, if false the Project::isError() will return an Error::Error object

Project::getPolls (   ) 
 

get all polls owned by the project

Returns:
Array with all poll objects in the project 
        Will output the data ordered in this way.
        Array(
            [0] => Object Poll
            [1] => Object Poll
        )

Project::getSite (   ) 
 

Gets the site that the project is locked to.

Returns:
string with the domain ie. apple.com, google.com, bar.foo.com aso.

Project::getTitle (   ) 
 

Gets the title of the project

Returns:
string with project title

Project::getUser (   ) 
 

Gets the user that the project is owned by.

Returns:
string with the username

Project::isError (   ) 
 

If the last method call failed this function will return an Error::Error object otherwise it will return false,

Returns:
false or an Error::Error object

Project::removePoll (  $  pollID  ) 
 

Delete the poll, remove the poll from the project and delete all info about the poll

Parameters:
$pollID id of the poll to remove
Returns:
true on sucess, false on error and Project::isError() will return an Error::Error object that describes the error

Project::save (   ) 
 

save all changes to the project

Returns:
false on error, true on sucess. If error Project::isError will return an Error object describing the error

Project::selectPoll (   ) 
 

find the poll to show today if a poll have set an interval that overlaps now it overrides polls that is shown on specific weekdays

Returns:
Poll object or false on error

Project::setSite (  $  site  ) 
 

Sets the site that the project should be locked to

Parameters:
$site string ie. apple.com foo.bar.com aso.
Returns:
true on sucess, false on error and the Project::isError() will return an Error::Error object

Project::setTitle (  $  title  ) 
 

Sets the title of the project

Parameters:
$title string, the title of the project
Returns:
true on sucess, false on error and the Project::isError() will return an Error::Error object

Project::setUser (  $  username  ) 
 

Sets the user that the project should be locked to

Parameters:
$username string username
Returns:
true on sucess, false on error and the Project::isError() will return an Error::Error object

Member Data Documentation

Project::$db = null
 

private var, reference to a PEAR::DB object

Project::$id = null
 

private var, contains the id of the project se also Project::getID

Project::$isError = false
 

private var, contains either false if no error or an Error object if there was an error in the last method call se also Error::Error and Project::isError

Project::$polls = array()
 

private var, contains the polls associated with this project, se also Project::getPoll Project::getPolls Project::addPoll Project::removePoll

Project::$site = null
 

private var, contains the domain that the poll is allowed to be used on, se also Project::setSite and Project::getSite

Project::$title = null
 

private var, contain the title of the project, se also Project::setTitle and Project::getTitle

Project::$user = null
 

private var, contains the username of the users that owns the project
